body:
Who is the person(s) you look up to or want to be like and why?

Roger Federer:
Tennis player who is the second highest paid athlete in the world.  Makes about 70 million in endorsements and won 80 million dollars in prize money.  Currently 3rd ranked player in the world, but held number 1 ranking for 5 years in a row.  Also holds 17 grandslams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, and US Open).
